definition: variant of 緣由|缘由[yuan2 you2]
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: This article explores how these things came to be.
sentences.chinese: 本文探究这些事物的形成原由。

sentences.english: If anybody would know, it would be my Teacher, the great sorcerer Lin.
sentences.chinese: 除了我的师傅林道长，没有人能知道其中的原由。

sentences.english: She explained all the hows and whys of the issue.
sentences.chinese: 她详尽说明了问题的情况及原由。

sentences.english: Could you tell the main reason for crankcase explosion?
sentences.chinese: 请您说出柴油机曲拐箱爆炸的缘故原由？

sentences.english: Pretentious has always been the subject of frequent combat is certainly a reason.
sentences.chinese: 总是孤芳自赏却屡受冲击肯定是有缘故原由的。
基于几个付梓上的缘故原由。

sentences.english: This is the reason for the movement of the shoulder, which is based on the joint of the chest.
sentences.chinese: 这就是以胸锁关节为支点的肩部向前可动性的原由。

sentences.english: Telling your story will validate your feelings.
sentences.chinese: 讲出你的事情原由就足以表明你的感受。

sentences.english: It would appear that the reasons go deeper than Thatcher's frail health.
sentences.chinese: 其中的原由似乎远超过撒切尔夫人虚弱的健康状况。

sentences.english: Reasons for William's invasion of England after Edward's death.
sentences.chinese: 威廉在德华后入侵英国的原由。

sentences.english: They do this because land that has rested produces a greater harvest.
sentences.chinese: 这样做的原由是休耕过的土地会生产出多得多的收成。

sentences.english: We’ve already talked about what gives your hair its natural color.
sentences.chinese: 前面我们已经介绍过形成天然发色的原由。

sentences.english: my reason for leaving the company is that i wish to get into the advertising business.
sentences.chinese: 本人去职的缘故原由是希望在广告业方面有所成长。

sentences.english: The potential for vast oil and gas reserves near the uninhabited islands is a key source of the conflict over them.
sentences.chinese: 这个无人岛周围丰富的油气储备是冲突的关键原由。

sentences.english: I went to them silently and asked the reasons.
sentences.chinese: 我毫无愠色的走到他们身边，询问吵嘴的原由。

sentences.english: The reason why he got angry was that she told him alie.
sentences.chinese: 他生气的缘故原由是她对他说了谎。

definition: the whys and the wherefores/the detailed story/root cause
cause and effects (idiom); entire process of development
the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
sth one wishes to keep secret/ulterior motive/a subject best avoided
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
a secret/sth best not told to anyone/confidential information
